i dont want to hold many websockets because its resource consuming __eou__
or atleast thats what i think it is, correct me if im wrong __eou__
i want kind of lazy usage of websockets is it possible? __eou__
lihaibh: use the websocket subject in rxjs or wrap your websocket into an observable and share it __eou__
and how would i know when to disconnect? __eou__
when all subscribers unsubscribe then the dispose function will be executed as long as you “share” it.  I think share has been removed so you would need to run .publishReplay(1).refcount(). __eou__
publishReplay? not regular 'publish'? __eou__

I had to implement an operator that delayed the dispose though, because since changing routes will destroy the components before the new ones are created and the websocket connection will be torn down. __eou__
It’s to share only 1 version of the websocket __eou__
